title: A Blitzcrank who hasn't used his Q is more threatening than a Blitzcrank who used it.
body:
Because you'll miss it anyways.

Let that sink in.

http://img.pandawhale.com/89952-master-strokes-beard-gif-Kill-bdei.gif

replies.body: Ninja Blitzcrank doesn't mind the missed Q so instead uses flash > E > Ult > Ignite when you decide it's safe now.
Have no fear, Ninja Blitzcrank is here.

Hey, just saying, if you find a link to the picture of that, you dont have to have an attachment and put the period there.
For example:
https://media3.giphy.com/media/amkxRknWsbWtG/200_s.gif

The link is https://media3.giphy.com/media/amkxRknWsbWtG/200_s.gi.f without the . at the end.

So you can just put that in and it will auto generate the image in and it will look less awkward with the .

Or maybe I should just http://i.imgur.com/dP8Eziv.gif because you don't care <3

i don't get it.

One of the casters in LCS said this and it was pretty funny.
It basically means that zoning potential of rocket grab is far more useful than missing it and loosing all threat.
Thank you China.
YES! lets give blitzcrank 10 skins!!!! who cares about the other champions with 2 skins!!!

The champions with 2 skins only have 2 skins because there are no good places for them to get skins. Like for Kalista, can you really think of a good skin for her to have? Most skins either have a really good skin idea, or are part of a set. Kalista's theme has very little to do with any good skin themes or group skin themes.

> The champions with 2 skins only have 2 skins because there are no good places for them to get skins. Like for Kalista, can you really think of a good skin for her to have? Most skins either have a really good skin idea, or are part of a set. Kalista's theme has very little to do with any good skin themes or group skin themes.

Said it before, Kal is crying out for a Woad skin.
A Blitzcrank that has tagged you with his Q before is more threatening than one that has never managed to.
